name: PlugaPunk!
description:
Mix sounds, while relooking up to 6 punk faces.  Punk modifications will have an impact on the sound they produce, so try to make them as nice as possible, and try to avoid bleeding ears XD !

The game ends whe you are bored  of trying to become the new Johann Sebastian Cyber Bach...

Instructions : 

All the game should be played on the mouse left button.

Click on severat punk parts, see what happens, and try to cyber-compose!
